FuncDef:
The bit-error-mode command configures the CRC or PREFEC bit error mode.
The undo bit-error-mode command cancels the configuration of the CRC or PREFEC bit error mode.
By default, the CRC bit error mode is used.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a detection interval for cost association.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 100, in seconds. The default value is 30.

Configures an interval of 200 ms at which bit errors are detected by FEC.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4. The default value is 1, namely, 200 ms.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure the CRC or PREFEC bit error mode, run the bit-error-mode command.
